body.name: All Mighty Pacs Laundry Detergent, Free Clear for Sensitive Skin, Tub, 60 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 6 mins
features: Unscented, no fragrance, and hundred percent free of perfumes and dyes with concentrated cleaning power in a convenient pac
all free clear is the #1 recommended detergent brand by dermatologists and pediatricians for sensitive skin.
Removes everyday dirt of Dog and cat, grass/tree pollen.
These hypoallergenic all free and clear mighty pacs are safe to use in any washing machine including high efficiency (HE) and at any water temperature.
This pack contains one tub of 60 all free clear mighty pacs, with one regular load per pac.
body.description: all free clear mighty pacs are 100 Percent free of perfumes and dyes with concentrated cleaning power in a convenient pac. all free clear is the 1 recommended detergent brand by dermatologists, allergists and pediatricians for sensitive skin. These hypoallergenic mighty pacs are Tough on Stains, Gentle on Skin. Use with all free clear fabric softener and dryer sheets for clean and soft clothes with static cling reduction in the dryer. All free and clear mighty pacs are unscented, fragrance free, and are safe to use in any washing machine including high efficiency (HE) and at any water temperature. This pack contains one tub of 60 all free clear mighty pacs, with one regular load per pac.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use container
reviews.reviewText: I've tried everything and scent free All seems to be the detergent that works best for my sensitive skin. The little pillow packs work great and this container is easy to use, though a little bulky if you're room tight. Just be mindful of the twist top, it can stick and if not put squarely to the groves and screwed closed, it may not hold. because it's in an akward place to reach, I ended up putting a piece of duct tap on one side and now I just flip the top open grab the little pillows and pop it closed again. "-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient, Cost Saving, AND Cleans Nice & Bright!
reviews.reviewText: Bottom line: One laundry detergent packet cleans a larger load than the laundry detergent instructions suggest, so I’m actually saving money on laundry detergent cost (and one of these containers lasts me longer than I expected), PLUS cleans better than I expected (I had been a loyal Tide Free & Clear customer), and these super easy to use, so this is a 5 star review.Extra Bonus & Important for folks needing to conserve water: I feel I am saving a bit of water because these laundry detergent packets avoid needing second rinses on dark colors to avoid powder residue.Detail: I originally purchased these laundry detergent packets with some hesitation but I had to because during COVID ‘empty-shelf days’ these laundry detergent packets were ‘all I could get.’ Very glad I did! I think these laundry packets get clothes cleaner and brighter than the Tide Fresh & Clear powder that we used to use pre-COVID.These laundry detergent packets are very handy. I was worried about two things: 1) That the little pre-measured laundry detergent packets would burst in the container over time and make a mess. THIS HASN’T HAPPENED IN MORE THAN ONE YEAR OF BUYING THESE. I haven’t had any issues with any bursting or disintegration of the detergent packets. If anything, these detergent packets are neater than using powder because no more stray powder granules to clean up, no more difficult powder detergent boxes to open.. 2) That using these pre-measured laundry detergent packets would be way more expensive than the easier to portion control Tide powder Free & Clear. THESE PRE-MEASURED LAUNDRY DETERGENT PACKETS ARE FAR MORE COST EFFECTIVE THAN THE TIDE POWDER WE WERE USING. This surprised me, but that’s because each laundry detergent packet packs a whallop of cleaning power. I tested to see how big a load one of these pre-measured laundry detergent packet will clean well, and (if it’s not super dirty) one packet can easily clean a large load. If there’s deep staining then I use two detergent packets for a large load. I use two detergent packets for a super load. I have never had a reason to use three detergent packets, that’s just overkill I think. My laundry machine is an old-school top loader.OTHER OBSERVATIONS:- Generally I don’t need to add any fabric softener or anything else to my laundry load but a detergent packet.- The whites get noticeably brighter than with the Tide Free & Clear powder I used to use.- With the Tide powder, sometimes some powder would leave light markings (powder residue) on dark colors that required a second rinse to avoid. These All laundry detergent packets avoid the issue of powder residue on dark colors, so I can avoid doing a second rinse, which saves both water and money.- Color brightness comes out fine, if anything I’ve noticed less dye transfer between colors when I’m too lazy to separate colors well.- If there’s a stain I generally do a Zout stain remover spray on the stain, and in my experience Zout stain remover spray works great with these laundry detergent packets.-In terms of the weight of carrying the container around, going from memory, I think a container of these laundry detergent packets weighs less (and therefore easier to handle) than a box of powder detergent.- In terms of neatness, the containers for these laundry detergent packets containers close nice and tight (a definite improvement over the powder laundry detergent boxes that can get sloppy and leave trails of detergent powder when you open them and carry them anywhere).Hope this is helpful info for you & that your experience just as good :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasts a long time
reviews.reviewText: This two pack is really great and lasts a long time. We do laundry for a family of 3 once a week usually around 3 loads and it lasts us around 8 months. I also like that this brand is clean and doesn’t have any strong scents. We haven’t had any issues with skin irritation and even used it for our newborns clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My partner has sensitive skin so we use the All free and clear because it does not have any artificial dyes, and no fragrance. We use one pod per normal load in our HE laundry machine. Works great to remove stains and our laundry is always clean and fresh without a heavy detergent smell.We add the pod directly into the machine basin, versus putting it into the designated detergent tray. We found that the coating around the pod does not always break down all the way if we place it in the tray. It does break down enough so that the detergent is able to get into the laundry, however, it leaves behind the pod casing residue if we use the tray.We’ve purchased this detergent many times, and anticipate many re-purchases.
